definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: The AF speed is very decent on the D200.
sentences.chinese: 在D200機身上對焦速度很不錯。

sentences.english: The hardware and software in this auto-focus system is introduced particularly .
sentences.chinese: 本文具體介紹了該自動對焦系統的硬件和軟件組成。

sentences.english: I am a fan of both the focusing lever and the larger attachable hood.
sentences.chinese: 我熱衷於對焦杆和大的附加遮光罩。

sentences.english: That’s only possible because, in this camera, the autofocus sensor can see the scene all the time.
sentences.chinese: 那是因爲，這款相機的自動對焦感應器能夠一直受光。

sentences.english: Improved the focusing accuracy when using the EC-20 Teleconverter.
sentences.chinese: 改進了對焦準確時，用歐共體20個鏡頭。

sentences.english: Auto-focusing system has been found wide application in mobile camera.
sentences.chinese: 自動對焦系統在手機中得到越來越廣泛的應用。

sentences.english: Take photos with a 3.2-megapixel autofocus camera.
sentences.chinese: 可自動對焦的320萬像素攝像頭。

sentences.english: In other words, this camera can focus and shoot simultaneously.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，這款相機可以邊對焦邊照相。

sentences.english: And to focus just on one capital sin is a mistake.
sentences.chinese: 所以只對焦在一個罪宗上，是一個錯誤。

sentences.english: But he said it was the size of a standard point-and-shoot camera.
sentences.chinese: 但是他表示相機的尺寸是標準的自動對焦相機大小。

sentences.english: Most auto-focus cameras focus on whatever is in the center of the picture.
sentences.chinese: 很多傻瓜相機是已照片中央處物體進行對焦的。

sentences.english: You need to set your focus to infinity. Try focusing on a stable object in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 你要把焦點設爲無窮遠，對準遠處一處固定物對焦。

sentences.english: EXILIM detects subjects and positions focus frames in the optimum locations.
sentences.chinese: 相機自動檢測物體並將對焦框置於最佳位置。

sentences.english: Fortunately there are several solutions to this focusing dilemma.
sentences.chinese: 幸而有一些解決對焦難題的方法。

sentences.english: Fold the focusing bars as shown, no adhesive needed.
sentences.chinese: 依折線將對焦棒折曲，不需黏合。

sentences.english: The selection of focus measure is the key to the auto-focusing by digital image processing.
sentences.chinese: 圖像法檢焦的關鍵在於對焦評價函數的選取。

definition: film/roll of film/also written 膠捲|胶卷
body of a vehicle or machine/fuselage of a plane
(technical) manual/(book of) directions/synopsis (of a play or film)/specification (patent)/CL:本[ben3]
